Package airTransport

Class DriverTransport

Object
DriverTransport
public class DriverTransport
extends Object
Driver class for everything which creates instances of each class and displays various information regarding each one. This is the driver class for the PublicTransportation, AirCraft, Ferry, CityBus, Metro and Tram classes.
Author:
pan

    • DriverTransport

      public DriverTransport()

  • Method Details

    • copyCityBus

      private static PublicTransportation[] copyCityBus​(PublicTransportation[] aCopy)
      Method to duplicate an array of PublicTransportation objects. Every object in the passed array has its class type tested, then the appropriate copy constructor for that class type is used to copy the object into the newly created array.
      Parameters:
      aCopy - the array to be copied
      Returns:
      returns the new duplicated array

    • minPriceIndex

      private static int minPriceIndex​(PublicTransportation[] arr)
      Static method to find the lowest ticket price in an array of PublicTransportation.
      Parameters:
      arr - array of PublicTransportation objects
      Returns:
      returns the index of the object with the lowest ticket price in the array

    • maxPriceIndex

      private static int maxPriceIndex​(PublicTransportation[] arr)
      Static method to find the highest ticket price in an array of PublicTransportation.
      Parameters:
      arr - array of PublicTransportation objects
      Returns:
      returns the index of the object with the highest ticket price in the array

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      Application's entry-point. In Part 1, every class is tested for: 1. default constructor 2. parameterized constructor 3. equals and toString methods For the AirCraft and Metro classes, the copy constructor also tested. For the AirCraft class, accessor and mutator methods are also tested. In Part 2, the classes' have been modified to the most restrictive/secure access rights. In addition, the copyCityBus static method is tested on an array of objects.
      Parameters:
      args - an array of command-line arguments for the application.
